Detailed Description

This file contains C wrapper functions for system calls.

The wrappers are used by user programs to perform system calls from C.

Definition in file scwrapper.h.

Function Documentation

static unsigned long createprocess ( const int  executable  )  [inline, static]

Wrapper for the system call that creates processes.

Parameters:
executable integer identifying the program which should be loaded and run as a process.
